name: Block Fix: Hexa Plus 1010
description:
Block Fix: Hexa Plus 1010 is very easy and simple, but addictive puzzle game.
This is a block puzzle classic game for all ages.
Download hexa block puzzle and you will love this game!
How to play
- Drag blocks to move them
- Try to fill them all in the row or column
- Blocks can't be rotated.
- Don't worry! No time limits!
